lead_paragraph: COGAN--Rev. William B.,S.J., on July 8, 2016. Reposing at the Murray-Weigel Hall Chapel, 515 E. Fordham Rd., Bronx, NYon Monday 3-5pm and 7-8:30pm. Funeral Mass at the Murray-Weigel Hall Chapel, Tuesday, 11:30am. Interment at the Jesuit Cemetery, Auriesville, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Northeast Province of the Society of Jesus, 39 E. 83rd St., NY, NY 10028, For information contact Farenga Bros., Inc., Directors (718) 654-0500. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  COGAN, REV. WILLIAM B.
